benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/bundles/{bundleId}/customFields - Add custom fields to bundle

covered: Valid Payload and successful creation: 201 responses with created CustomField objects for TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC17, TC19.

Invalid Payload and input validation: 400 responses for malformed body, missing/invalid headers, invalid bundleId, missing required fields, duplicates, and extra fields (TC05, TC08, TC09, TC10, TC11, TC12, TC18, TC07).
Non-existing resource handling: 404 when bundle does not exist (TC06).
Authorization and headers coverage: 401 for missing token (TC14); 400 for missing required header (TC07); 201 when valid header is provided (TC01/TC02).
Query parameters handling: Extra query parameters are accepted (TC13).
Edge cases and validations: Duplicate field names (TC11); unsupported fields (TC12).
Performance and reliability: timeout with retry (TC16); large payloads (TC17); concurrent requests (TC22).
Security: SQL injection (TC23) and XSS (TC24) handling.
Dependency and service availability: service unavailability (TC15) and dependent service failure (TC20).
Documentation accessibility: API docs are accessible (TC25).
gaps: Duplicate Submission: No explicit idempotency/duplicate submission test across separate requests.
Internal server error: No explicit 500 Internal Server Error scenario (503 only in tests).
Rate limiting: No test for throttling or rate limiting.
Caching behavior: No tests for ETag/Cache-Control headers on POST.
403 Forbidden: No test specifically asserting 403 response (only 401).
Invalid query parameter combinations: No test for invalid or conflicting query params beyond extra parameters.
Comprehensive coverage of very large concurrent load beyond TC22: TC22 covers concurrency but more scenarios could be added.
Additional edge-case tests for content-type negotiation or invalid content-type header not included.
recommendations: Add idempotency/duplicate submission test; verify semantics on repeated POST with same payload.
Add 500 Internal Server Error simulation to validate server error handling.
Add rate-limiting tests (429 or appropriate) under high load to ensure proper throttling.
Add caching tests for POST responses (ETag, Cache-Control) if applicable.
Add 403 Forbidden explicit tests to cover authorization edge-case beyond 401.
Expand query parameter testing to include invalid/ conflicting parameter combinations.
Enhance concurrency tests by varying bundleIds and field payloads to detect race conditions.
Document expected behavior for field casing across all scenarios (TC21) and ensure consistent enforcement.
